name: Screams in a Pod
description:
Screams in a Pod is an action-packed arcade-style game where you play as a spaceship refueling on earth. The goal is to  catch as many earthlings as possible with your capture pod in order to keep your ship fueled. Try to last as long as you can – but watch out! While some earthlings will give you extra fuel (like cows) others will wreck your ship and cause you to lose fuel (children)!

Game Instructions:

Control a UFO and shoot your capture pod to catch earthling! You can move left and right. 

Don't let your fuel bar hit zero! Earthlings give you fuel. 

You have to retrieve the capture pod every time you shoot it! If you let it fly past, you won't get fuel and precious earthling lives will have been wasted. 

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move left and right

A,D : Rotate gun left and right

Space: Shoot pod
